website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that features a long handle and good durability, but some come a little on the rough side.
pros: 56" in overall length, with a 1 1/4" handle diameter
Made from natural fibers, with double stitched nylon cord
cons: Corn fibers are on the coarse side and have too much spring, while some buyers say the handles come very rough, some with splinters

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description, Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Handle is NOT 56''. Handle is 40''. Bristles fall out constantly. They also have a lot of spring, so it ends up propelling dirt everywhere as you try to gather it up.
customer_reviews.author: Artem Maydan

customer_reviews.title: My Witch Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My lady needed a new form of transportation, she started looking at Minis and Kias. I said no way, those aren’t even safe, way too small and you’re better off above the traffic! So I got her this sturdy corn broom instead and she wisked herself away into a spiraling sweeping frenzy. I can’t believe how much a clean floor helps my thinking process. And seeing her new “ride” hanging on the wall gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: What a steal! This is the second one I've purchased and the only reason I bought another, is because my Great Dane thought the first one was a giant toothpick. This is seriously a sturdy well-made straw broom. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: Great old fashion solid broom. Brushes of good strength and get up all the dirt. I use it in my barn where it gets lots of use and it’s holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee F Dorrance

customer_reviews.title: Good basic broom.
customer_reviews.text: Basic broom. The broom part is longer/taller than standard size. Made a little cheaply, but it works. I use this for my garage and it does the job fine.
customer_reviews.author: D. Heff

customer_reviews.title: Rough handle!
customer_reviews.text: Photo is deceiving. The handle is natural wood and it does have a few rough places in it as for splinters. The handle is not painted any color at all. But other than that, broom seems to be a usable tool.
customer_reviews.author: TODD JONES

customer_reviews.title: Wrong broom delivered
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the broom that I paid for, the handle was not painted, and I can only use it while wearing gloves because the handle was not even sanded. I kept it because I don't want to keep having to send items back. I will just stop using amazon to buy items.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaramts

customer_reviews.title: Quite Good!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd have the desire to review a broom, but this thing is quite good! It sweeps a rather large area in one sweep opposed to other brooms we've had that took multiple sweeps to move a little dirt around. The price makes it even better! ($11, vs some other $36 versions we saw).
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints other than the fact that it's a bit shorter than what the picture suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Hajar

customer_reviews.title: durable product
customer_reviews.text: I refer corn brooms to use for floors and whatnot as they tend to actually do the job. will pick up the debris on floor, ceiling, corners without splitting the bristles. this is a really good broom
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom
customer_reviews.text: Awesome old school broom! Perfect for outdoors! Very big & strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ness

customer_reviews.title: She says it is very well made and the handle is really nice.. she was very happy with the broom ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she loves it. She says it is very well made and the handle is really nice.. she was very happy with the broom I bought her.
customer_reviews.author: traci a.

customer_reviews.title: A big thumbs up!  Great broom.
customer_reviews.text: I am a union custodian. This broom is the real deal. Very well built. The handle is a bit thick, but it is very sturdy and the broom moves dirt. Beats the heck out of those lousy metal handled brooms that will break in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Natural Fiber Broom
customer_reviews.text: Full size commercial grade product. Prefer this natural fiber brush over many synthetic types. i do hang broom on a nail to extend its life and keep the bristles straight.
customer_reviews.author: evilguy46

customer_reviews.title: Swept away with the hype
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The bristles are barely held together by a loose cord and one pass on the garage floor and I needed a second broom to sweep up the bristles that didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Gaelic Savvy Soul

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good broom
customer_reviews.text: Good broom, sturdy and up to the task of garage or driveway work.
customer_reviews.author: P. Loftis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality broom
customer_reviews.text: It's a broom. It works like a broom. Good quality. Good length.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Full size broom
customer_reviews.text: After pricing out costume brooms that were about the same price, I came across this gem. Definitely much better quality. Tall enough for an adult Witch costume. I even swept up the floor is with it and it wasn’t falling apart. I plan on burning the edges a little bit for effect. Definitely worth the price and what I needed for him.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Arnold

customer_reviews.title: and they are going to be great to use afterwards
customer_reviews.text: Drilled holes to use for our witches to "ride" in our Halloween display, and they are going to be great to use afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Lost several bristles with very first use. It gets the job done but not sure how long it will last. Also seems to hold onto a lot of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality. Only some of the straws were messed ...
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality. Only some of the straws were messed up when I opened the box. But very good quality overall.
customer_reviews.author: Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Several months later and it still works great on my time and carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Campbell

customer_reviews.title: with a great price, with a real wood handle
customer_reviews.text: Folks, this is a well made 11" broom, with a great price, with a real wood handle. A Prime Member. Thanks Amazon ! JR Richard
customer_reviews.author: JR Shalla

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality broom and the handle is a practical length ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality broom and the handle is a practical length for someone who is not six feet tall!
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, Wooden handle is heavier than most which is probably not necessary but I retired the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Reader123

customer_reviews.title: It works no you do
customer_reviews.text: Love to sweep put it down long enough to write this
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Broom
customer_reviews.text: It's a broom what more can there be to say?
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Kavinoky

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Took for ever to get my broom. Beats a vacuum cleaner anyday. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: tisha

customer_reviews.title: Good broom, but not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was drawn to this broom because of the black handle and stitching. The broom I receive has a natural handle and string. It'll serve it's purpose, but isn't as pictured. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: fewerbetter

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not even use I could see you in Fall Apart right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: alan g.

customer_reviews.title: Solid broom
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted in an outdoor broom. It's sturdy and well-made. The handle is slightly crooked, but that's just an aesthetic flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice big bristles, and handle, but bristles fall off easily and it's not lasting as long as I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle isn’t black as pictured...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a broom with a black handle, however it came plain, finished wood. Oh well. Still a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are stiff and some have fallen out. Hard to get into corners when compared to a more modern broom. Probably better for outdoor use or use in a garage compared to in the house as a daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: item has a natural wood handle, not a painted one. also, it has clear plastic stitching instead of the black cord (which is already coming undone)
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice broom, a little smaller than expected but perfectly functional.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Shopaholic
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this broom. It’s hard to find one with the natural bristles now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price n product
customer_reviews.text: 2 the point... I needed an old fashion broom that fit a tall person. Function 5+ Size n height..as picture and I am 5'11" female. Good price n product..purchase recommended 5+
customer_reviews.author: Yelo Mary

customer_reviews.title: FYI - Photo is misleading!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy broom but the handle is NOT black as shown in the picture. It's a natural wood color!!
customer_reviews.author: target lover!

customer_reviews.title: Good Corn Broom
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a good corn broom. Works so much better than some plastic fantastic POS.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Da Man

customer_reviews.title: And the amazing thing is it fits everyone who uses it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for a REAL broom! Couldn't believe I found it on Amazon! And the amazing thing is it fits everyone who uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband said it looked like a witch’s broom
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Will last a long time. Husband said it looked like a witch’s broom. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA W.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got mine in the mail today, the handle isn’t actually black.
customer_reviews.author: K. Martinsen

product_meta.title: Genuine Joe Janitor Lobby Blend Broom
product_meta.description: Janitor lobby blend broom is made with natural fibers for durable long life and efficient sweeping. Double-stitched, nylon cord, bound fibers are wire-wrapped onto a 56" wood handle.
feature_bullets: Natural fibers for durable long life
Fibers are double-stitched with nylon cord

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
